text: The UEFA European Under-18 Championship 1965 Final Tournament was held in West Germany. ==Teams== The following teams entered the tournament: * * * * * * * * (host) * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Group stage== ===Group A=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 1 1 0 3 1 +2 3 2 1 1 0 2 1 +1 3 2 0 0 2 0 3 –3 0 15 April 1–1 17 April 1–0 19 April 2–0 ===Group B=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 1 1 0 3 1 +2 3 2 0 2 0 0 0 0 2 2 0 1 1 1 3 –2 1 15 April 0–0 17 April 0–0 19 April 1–3 ===Group C=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 15 1 +14 4 2 1 0 1 3 5 –2 2 2 0 0 2 1 13 –12 0 15 April 2–1 17 April 11–0 19 April 4–1 ===Group D=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 7 1 +6 4 2 0 1 1 2 3 –1 1 2 0 1 1 1 6 –5 1 15 April 2–1 17 April 1–1 19 April 5–0 ===Group E=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 1 1 0 4 0 +4 3 2 0 2 0 3 3 0 2 2 0 1 1 3 7 –4 1 15 April 0–0 17 April 4–0 19 April 3–3 ===Group F=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 1 1 0 3 0 +3 3 2 1 0 1 3 5 –2 2 2 0 1 1 2 3 –1 1 15 April 3–0 17 April 0–0 19 April 3–2 ===Group G=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 9 1 +8 4 2 0 1 1 3 4 –1 1 2 0 1 1 2 9 –7 1 15 April 2–1 17 April 2–2 19 April 7–0 ===Group H=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 2 2 0 0 7 4 +3 4 2 0 0 2 4 7 –3 0 15 April 3–2 19 April 2–4 ==Quarterfinals== ==Semifinals== ===Places 5-8=== ===Places 1-4=== ==Final Matches== ===Seventh Place Match=== ===Fifth Place Match=== ===Third place match=== ==Final== ==Other websites== *Results by RSSSF Category:UEFA European Under-19 Championship Category:1965 in association football Category:1965 in Europe
title: 1965 UEFA European Under-18 Championship
